```{r}
adoptions <- readRDS("~/Stats 316 S19/Project/adoptions/adoptions.rds")
```


```{r}
adoptions %>%
  mutate(month = month(outcome_date))%>%
  filter(!is.na(month))%>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(x=month))

adoptions %>%
  filter(animal_type=="WILDLIFE") %>%
  group_by(animal_breed) %>%
  summarise(n()) %>%
  print(n=32)


adoptions%>%
  filter(dog == 1) %>%
  filter(adopted == 1) %>%
  group_by(outcome_date) %>%
  tally() %>%
  ggplot()+
  geom_histogram(aes(x=n))
```
